article_title: Boehner: House will not pass bill to re-open government until Obama agrees to negotiate
article_text: Speaker John Boehner said Sunday that the House of Representatives will not pass bills to re-open the federal government or raise the debt limit unless President Barack Obama comes to the negotiating table.
